de.ddkfm.models

Class LogicValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ddkfm.models.LogicValue
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ALU, BaseSwitch, BCD, CounterLine, Dataline, DataSwitch, Decoder, DigitalDisplay, Flag, Increment, InputSwitch, Memory, Muxer, ProgramSwitch, RAM, RAMLine, RAMSwitch, Register

    public class LogicValue
extends java.lang.Object
    the main class the the microprocessorsimulation which is the superclass of all parts of the simulator

      • change

        public void change(LogicValue sender,
                   int index,
                   boolean value)
        change will trigger the LogicValue that a incoming connection changed its value
        Parameters:
        sender - the logicValue which fired the change method
        index - which index should be changed
        value - to which value should the index be set

      • changeByExtern

        public void changeByExtern(java.lang.Object sender,
                           int index,
                           boolean value)
        same function like change but in this the case can be every object( normally a Button)
        Parameters:
        the - object which fired the change method
        index - which index should be changed
        value - to which value should the index be set

      • sendValueToOutput

        protected void sendValueToOutput(int index,
                                 boolean value)
        protected method which should write the specified internal value to all (or a part of) outputs
        Parameters:
        index - index that should be write to the output
        value - value that should be wirte to the output
